knowledge_entries.question: How do I get paid?
knowledge_entries.answer: Getting paid is easy! Go to Settings ‚Üí Payouts, choose your method (Bank, PayPal, Crypto, or Payout Card), enter your details, and verify. Once you have earnings, click 'Request Payout' and your money is on the way! Bank takes 3-4 days, PayPal same-day, Crypto 2-6 hours, Payout Card instant.

knowledge_entries.question: When do I get paid?
knowledge_entries.answer: Timing depends on revenue type: Tips = instant, PPV sales = 2 days, Subscriptions = 5 days after billing, Live streams = 24 hours. Then choose payout method: Payout Card (instant), PayPal (same day), Crypto (2-6 hrs), Bank (3-4 days). You control when you withdraw!

knowledge_entries.question: What payout methods are available?
knowledge_entries.answer: Four great options! 1) Bank Transfer (FREE for U.S., 3-4 days), 2) PayPal (2% fee, same day), 3) Cryptocurrency (1% fee, 2-6 hours), 4) Payout Card ($2.50/transfer, instant!). Choose based on speed vs fees. Most creators use bank for large amounts, PayPal for speed.

knowledge_entries.question: How much does BoyFanz take?
knowledge_entries.answer: You keep 80% on subscriptions, PPV sales, paid messages, and streams. You keep 85% on tips (better rate!). Platform fee covers payment processing, hosting, and support. Industry-leading rates! Plus many payout methods are FREE (bank transfer).

knowledge_entries.question: What's the minimum payout amount?
knowledge_entries.answer: Minimums vary by method: Bank Transfer $50, PayPal $20, Cryptocurrency $100, Payout Card $10. Pro tip: Wait for larger amounts when using PayPal (2% fee) to minimize fee impact. Bank transfer is FREE so withdraw anytime over $50!

knowledge_entries.question: Why is money in my pending balance?
knowledge_entries.answer: Pending balance is being processed and will clear soon! Holding periods: Subscriptions (5 days), PPV sales (2 days), Streams (24 hours), Tips (instant). This prevents fraud and chargebacks. Once cleared, it moves to current balance and you can withdraw it!

knowledge_entries.question: How do I set up bank transfer payouts?
knowledge_entries.answer: Settings ‚Üí Payouts ‚Üí Bank Transfer. Enter your routing number and account number (find on check or bank app). We'll send micro-deposits (small amounts like $0.23) to verify - confirm those amounts. Once verified, you're all set! FREE transfers, 3-4 day processing.

knowledge_entries.question: My payout failed, what do I do?
knowledge_entries.answer: Common fixes: 1) Verify bank/PayPal info is correct (no typos!), 2) Ensure account is verified, 3) Check you meet minimum balance, 4) Confirm bank didn't reject transfer. Go to Settings ‚Üí Payouts ‚Üí Review Details. If still stuck, contact support with the error code!

knowledge_entries.question: How can I get paid faster?
knowledge_entries.answer: Fastest to slowest: 1) Payout Card (INSTANT, 24/7), 2) Cryptocurrency (2-6 hours), 3) PayPal (same day), 4) Bank Transfer (3-4 days). For speed, use Payout Card or crypto. For free transfers, use bank. Get verified creator status for even faster processing!

knowledge_entries.question: What are payout fees?
knowledge_entries.answer: Bank Transfer (U.S.): FREE! International wire: $25. PayPal: 2% (max $20). Cryptocurrency: 1%. Payout Card: $2.50 per transfer. Pro tip: Use bank for amounts >$500 to avoid fees. PayPal's 2% is okay for smaller, urgent withdrawals. Choose wisely!

knowledge_entries.question: Do I need to pay taxes on my earnings?
knowledge_entries.answer: Yes! You're self-employed. U.S. creators: Set aside 25-30% for taxes, file Schedule C, pay quarterly estimated taxes. Get 1099-NEC if you earn >$600/year. International: Submit W-8BEN to reduce U.S. withholding, report in your country. Track ALL earnings and expenses. Hire accountant if earning >$50K!

knowledge_entries.question: What is a chargeback?
knowledge_entries.answer: A chargeback is when a fan disputes a charge with their bank/card company. The amount is deducted from your balance plus a $15 fee. Prevent them by: delivering promised content, clear descriptions, responding to questions, keeping records. We fight illegitimate chargebacks for you!

knowledge_entries.question: Can I have multiple payout methods?
knowledge_entries.answer: Yes! You can add Bank, PayPal, Crypto, and Payout Card all at once. Choose which one to use for each withdrawal. Smart strategy: Bank for large amounts (free), PayPal for medium (fast), Payout Card for small/urgent (instant). Flexibility is key!

knowledge_entries.question: How do I track my earnings?
knowledge_entries.answer: Dashboard ‚Üí Earnings! You'll see: today/week/month/lifetime earnings, balance breakdown (current/pending), earnings by source (subs/PPV/tips), top content, payout history, and detailed reports. Export to CSV for your records. Track everything to optimize your strategy and prepare taxes!

knowledge_entries.question: What's the Payout Card?
knowledge_entries.answer: It's a Mastercard debit card linked to your creator earnings! Transfer money INSTANTLY anytime (24/7), $10 minimum, $2.50 fee per transfer. Use it for purchases or ATM withdrawals. Perfect for daily access to your money. Order in Settings ‚Üí Payouts ‚Üí Payout Card. Ships in 7-10 days!
